Package application

Class OrderDonutController

java.lang.Object
application.OrderDonutController
public class OrderDonutController
extends java.lang.Object
This class is used as the donut GUI controller for the stage created by the the MainMenuController class.
Author:
HECTOR CERDA, LUIS FIGUEROAGIL

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    (package private) void addDonutButton​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
    It adds a Donut object to the listView, updates the count variable when a Donut object, and calls the updateAddSubTotal method.
    (package private) void addToOrder​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
    It adds any Donut object on the listView to the Order Object.
    (package private) void donutFlavorChangeOptions​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
    It changes the donut flavors corresponding to each donut type.
    (package private) void initialize()
    It initializes corresponding variables.
    (package private) void removeDonutButton​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
    It removes a Donut object from the listView, updates the count and subtotal variable depending on the Donut object removed.
    void setMainController​(MainMenuController controller)
    Gets the an order reference from the main controller.
    (package private) void updateAddSubTotal()
    It updates the subtotal when any type of donut is added to the order list.
